'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 4''' is the fourth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*16. {{JP|More Food, Stat!|緊急事態!? 食料不足を解消せよ!!|Kinkyū Jitai!? Shokuryō Fusoku o Kaishō Seyo!!}}
*17. {{JP|Navy's Tiny New Friend|ネイビーと小さな友だち|Neibī to Chīsana Tomodachi}}
*18. {{JP|Clash with the Mighty Enderman!!|強敵エンダーマンと対決!!|Kyōteki Endāman to Taiketsu!!}}
*19. {{JP|They're Back! Platinum vs. Ruby!|宿敵現る! プラチナVSルビー|Shukutei Genru! Purachina VS Rubī}}
*20. {{JP|Let The Pie Wars Begin!|パイをめぐる熱き戦い!?|Pai o Meguru Atsuki Tatakai!?}}
